sentences.english: We have invited a famous former student to give away the prizes.
sentences.chinese: 我們邀請了一位知名校友來頒發獎品。

sentences.english: Can you tell us about one of your famous alumni?
sentences.chinese: 能跟我們分享一位你們學校的著名校友嗎？

sentences.english: At the banquet table, I had the good fortune to sit vis-a-vis an old school chum.
sentences.chinese: 我有幸和一位昔日的老校友坐在宴會桌的對面。

sentences.english: At that time, alumnus of Lin Jiaxi asks whether he can invest Guangzhou fast dragon.
sentences.chinese: 當時，林嘉喜的一位校友問他是否可以投資廣州迅龍。

sentences.english: DG Interpretation Alumni Association in China. … DG Interpretation Alumni.
sentences.chinese: 歐洲委員會口譯總司中國校友會。

sentences.english: If your former school has an alumni group, get involved.
sentences.chinese: 如果你以前的學校有校友會，那就加入吧。

sentences.english: Who are some famous alumni from Princeton?
sentences.chinese: 普林斯頓有哪些有名的校友呢？

sentences.english: I am not the teaching staff or alumni of Po Leung Kuk Laws Foundation College.
sentences.chinese: 本人並非保良局陸慶濤小學之在職教員或校友。

sentences.english: You are our fifth group of alumni.
sentences.chinese: 你們是我校的第五批校友。

sentences.english: The Alumnae Association is my link to the school's present administration.
sentences.chinese: 女校友協會是我和現在學校行政部門之間的紐帶。

sentences.english: Would you be interested in having a Dubai Vatel Alumni Club?
sentences.chinese: 你們有興趣組建一個迪拜瓦岱勒人校友俱樂部嗎？

sentences.english: And I guess like, I know a lot of them like, who are popular now.
sentences.chinese: 很多普林斯頓的校友現在都非常有名。

sentences.english: The college just finished building a new alumni building.
sentences.chinese: 這所大學剛建成了一座校友大樓。

sentences.english: The alumnae chapter gets together twice a year.
sentences.chinese: 女校友們兩年聚會一次。

sentences.english: Have demonstrated support for the VTC and its alumni development.
sentences.chinese: 對職訓局及其校友事務發展給予支持。

definition: anniversary of the founding of a school
abbr. for 清華大學|清华大学[Qing1 hua2 Da4 xue2]
the Great Learning, one of the Four Books 四書|四书[Si4 shu1] in Confucianism
to study at the same school/fellow student/classmate/CL:位[wei4],個|个[ge4]
Peking University (abbr. for 北京大學|北京大学)
attached (or affiliated) secondary (or middle) school/abbr. for 附屬中學|附属中学[fu4 shu3 zhong1 xue2]
